headline: Corrections
abstract: Corrections that appeared in print on Sunday, Jan. 12, 2020.
lead_paragraph: An article on Oct. 13 about the use of images from the photo-sharing site Flickr in facial-recognition technology misstated a goal of the CyberPatriot program. It encourages young people to pursue careers in fields like cybersecurity, not just careers in intelligence and the military. This correction was delayed, because the error was only recently brought to the editorsâ€™ attention.
